price: 48. Giet vervolgens over zijn hoofd de bestraffing van het kokende water.
arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa rasihi min ʿadhābi al-ḥamīmi
